definition: Creation that has not been removed by the user (it shows up in user's panel)
User that has initiated a creation
column3: which can be or not active for the time being. A User forming part of a collaboration (active or not) is also considered as a creator.

definition: User that has published a creation
column3: which can be or not active for the time being. A User forming part of a published collaboration (active or not) is also considered as a publisher.

definition: User that has accessed their panel within the last 30/60/90 days or has a creation visualized within the last 30/60/90 days. A user forming part of a collaboration visualized within the last 30/60/90 days is also considered as an active user.
User with social profile active and that has published a creation
column3: which can be active or not for the time being
column4: in their social profile. A user forming part of a published collaboration (active or not) in owner's social profile is also considered as a promoter. Owner's social profile must be active too.
